channel.title: Spells like Teleother & combat spells
channel.description: We all know that when you click a tele-other spell or combat spell, it allows you to choose a target and use click to do some type of effect. What im wondering is how do i reproduce this effect on another spell id/case/w-e its called. EG (Click on the charge icon and then shows cast charget on...) Looking both thru client and server and couldn't reach the answer. help is appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2008, 04:36:28 pm[/size][hr]Bump o.o

item.title: Spells like Teleother & combat spells
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

We all know that when you click a tele-other spell or combat spell, it allows you to choose a target and use click to do some type of effect. What im wondering is how do i reproduce this effect on another spell id/case/w-e its called. EG (Click on the charge icon and then shows cast charget on…)
Looking both thru client and server and couldn’t reach the answer. help is appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2008, 04:36:28 pm[/size][hr]Bump o.o
